text: Ezɨ Atrivim Devit kamaghɨn mɨdorozir gumazibar dapanim Joap mɨgei, “Nɨ mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapaniba inigh, ia mangɨ Israelian gumazamiziba bar me mengegh. Ia Israelian anababa bar dar mangɨ, notɨn amadaghan Danɨn nguibar ekiam ikegh, mangɨ sautɨn amadaghan Berseban nguibar ekiamɨn otogh, nɨ gumazamiziba bar me mengegh. Kɨ e uan gumazamizibar dɨbobonim gɨfoghasa.”
